history.narrative: Law 3-129 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-240, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 25, 1980 and December 9, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 7, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 3-338 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
